name: RIGGED (itch) (Kingpin Gaming)
description:
A movement shooter set in the distant future, in a world where right and wrong are blurred, Rigged explores the differences of individuality in a dark world contrasting the hope of the player. 

You take control of the artificial intelligence known as Bishop after it returns from a deep sea diving expedition, to find that an infection born of the oil being drilled takes control of the rig.  You follow Bishop down the path to shut down the rigs safely to clear the infection. Life as we know it all depends on how far Bishop is willing to go, programming be damned. Fighting against the only people it has ever known, Bishop is truly alone...

Produced entirely by high school students at Centre Wellington District High School's innovative Game Development course over the span of 9 weeks!
